/usr/bin/c++ -g -Wall -rdynamic CMakeFiles/5.advanced_lighting__5.2.steep_parallax_mapping.dir/src/5.advanced_lighting/5.2.steep_parallax_mapping/steep_parallax_mapping.cpp.o -o /repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/bin/5.advanced_lighting/5.advanced_lighting__5.2.steep_parallax_mapping   -L/repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/lib -lglfw -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lfreetype -lassimp libSTB_IMAGE.a libGLAD.a  -ldl
